=====================================

### Government Tender Announcement
=====================================

#### Title
----------------

* **English**: Quantum Technology Support Services
* **French**: Services de soutien aux technologies quantiques

#### Reference
------------

* **Number**: PW-22-01004535
* **Amendment Number**: 2
* **Solicitation Number**: W7714-227998/B

#### Overview
------------

This bid solicitation cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number W7714-227998/A, dated 12 April 2022, with a closing date of 27 May 2022 at 14:00 Eastern Daylight Time. The Tactical Radar (TR) group of the Radar Sensing & Exploitation (RSE) section at Defence Research and Development Canada (DRDC) Ottawa is conducting Research and Development (R&D) in five Quantum Technology Areas in support of defence applications.

**Objective**
-------------

The objective of this requirement is to provide research and development support to DRDC Ottawa Research Centre in the investigation of novel quantum sensing protocols, credible performance prediction theory for potential quantum sensor design, and generation and processing of real data. Up to five contracts may be awarded as a result of this solicitation.

**Scope**
----------

The R&D is related to quantum sensing and related areas, specifically quantum-enhanced and novel quantum-inspired classical sensing, to support the Canadian Armed Forces (CAF)/Department of National Defence (DND) in concept development and the specification of future systems/fleets in terms of equipment modernization and recapitalization.

**Requirements**
--------------

The requirements include:

* Investigation of novel quantum sensing protocols and related areas
* Development of credible performance prediction theory for potential quantum sensor design
* Generation and processing of real data

**Tender Evaluation**
--------------------

Up to five contracts may be awarded as a result of this solicitation. The contractors will be selected based on their ability to provide the required research and development support.
